Package model

Class Image

  • java.lang.Object
    • model.Image
  • public class Image
extends java.lang.Object
    This is the representation class of any Image that is going to be processed in the entire application. It contains 3 channels, Red, Green and Blue as 2D Arrays. It also contains logic for intensity, luma and value for a particular pixel.

    • Constructor Summary

      Constructors 
      Constructor Description
      Image​(int[][] redChannel, int[][] greenChannel, int[][] blueChannel)
      Initiates a new image object given R G B values.
